name: SWIPE
description: It's time to SWIPE! Move up, down, left and right to avoid the oncoming black dots. Collect as many crystals as you can to get the high score! Share your score with family and friends to see who can get the highest score - endless fun for everyone!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
